LanguageData.TM_ProvisionerAuraHD.label: Provisioner Aura
LanguageData.TM_ProvisionerAuraHD.description: Improves the availability of provisions for nearby pawns.
LanguageData.TM_TaskMasterAuraHD.label: Task Master Aura
LanguageData.TM_TaskMasterAuraHD.description: Manages the tasks and priorities of nearby pawns, increasing diligence but reduces mood.
LanguageData.TM_CommanderAuraHD.label: Commander Aura
LanguageData.TM_CommanderAuraHD.description: Inspires nearby pawns with charisma and leadership.
LanguageData.TM_StayAlertHD.label: Alert
LanguageData.TM_StayAlertHD.description: Received an order to invigorate alert levels.

LanguageData.TM_MoveOutHD.description: Received an order to move quickly.
LanguageData.TM_MoveOutHD.stages.0.label: Recovering
LanguageData.TM_HoldTheLineHD.label: Defensive stance
LanguageData.TM_HoldTheLineHD.description: Received an order to hold position and fight bravely.
LanguageData.TM_HTLShieldHD.label: HTL Shield
LanguageData.TM_HTLShieldHD.description: Increased fortitude from being ordered to hold the line.
